content: the work from home cardigan is a simple cozy topper that you can throw on whenever you need an extra layer that won t slow you down pretty enough for zoom and perfect paired with pj pants when designing the work from home cardigan i wanted to design a lightweight but warm and oversized piece that you could throw on at your desk when things get chilly the arms are left free for typing and working and the length won t get caught up in your office chair or tangled up with other garments this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here the work from home cardigan is a simple cozy topper that you can throw on whenever you need an extra layer that won t slow you down pretty enough for zoom and perfect paired with pj pants when designing the work from home cardigan i wanted to design a lightweight but warm and oversized piece that you could throw on at your desk when things get chilly the arms are left free for typing and working and the length won t get caught up in your office chair or tangled up with other garments it s also great for cooking teaching or as a warm topper for everything from tees to turtlenecks that all said you can totally easily adjust the length of this one add the same number of row to the back and to each front piece to create a custom length for your work from home cardigan
